Uses of Interface
org.bremersee.comparator.ValueExtractor

Packages that use ValueExtractor
Package
Description
org.bremersee.comparator
This package contains general mechanism for comparing and sorting objects.

  • Uses of ValueExtractor in org.bremersee.comparator

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    DefaultValueExtractor
    The default value extractor supports field names and paths as described in SortOrder.
